site.title: Fabrik.dev
site.description: Fabrik is a CTO as a Service company that helps you build your MVP with the right technical expertise, at a fraction of the cost.

hero.title: The <0>Challenge</0> of <0>Launching your own MVP</0>
hero.description: <1>Launching an MVP (Minimum Viable Product) is a monumental task, especially for solopreneurs!</1> <1>As such, you‚Äôre the visionary, the driving force behind your idea. You can - and you will - face these challenges:</1>

challenges.title: ü§î Finding Technical Expertise
challenges.description: Searching for the right developer can be a daunting, awfully time-consuming task.

challenges.title: üòß High Costs and Resource Constraints
challenges.description: Traditional development routes can be very expensive.

challenges.title: üòµ‚Äçüí´ Lack of Technical Guidance
challenges.description: Without the right guidance, navigating the complexities of tech development can be overwhelming.

solution.title: Your own <0>Personal CTO</0> & <0>Tailored Development Package</0>
solution.description: Even the most brilliant ideas need the right technical expertise to flourish. And that's where our 'CTO as a Service' steps in! We‚Äôre not just a service; we‚Äôre your strategic technology partner, committed to transforming your vision into a viable, market-ready MVP.

reasons.title: Time-Efficient Process
reasons.description: We save you valuable time, accelerating your MVP's journey from idea to market.

reasons.title: Custom-Tailored MVP
reasons.description: Your vision is unique, and so should be your MVP. We ensure it aligns perfectly with your business goals.

reasons.title: Long-Term Business Impact
reasons.description: Our approach is not just about building an MVP; it's about setting a strong foundation for your business's future.

features.title: Our <0>Key Features</0>
features.description: Here are the top notch of our features, but there's also plenty more we can offer - and you can see them below

list.title: Risk-Free Guarantee
list.description: If you're not satisfied with a developer's performance, we provide an alternative without any additional charges.

list.title: CTO-On-Demand
list.description: Access to experienced CTOs for strategic advice and oversight, ensuring your MVP aligns with your vision.

list.title: Cost-Effective Solutions
list.description: Our model is designed to be affordable, offering more value at a fraction of the cost.

list.title: Vetted Developer Matchmaking
list.description: We connect you with developers who are not just skilled but perfectly matched to your project's needs.

points.title: Bespoke CTO Consulting: Your Strategic Tech Ally
points.description: Navigating the tech world can be daunting. With our CTO Consulting service, you gain more than technical advice; you gain a strategist, a guide who aligns technology with your business goals. From selecting the right tech stack to designing scalable architectures, we cover it all. Our expertise lies in our ability to understand your vision and translate it into technological success.

points.title: Developer Matchmaking: Pairing You with the Perfect Talent
points.description: The backbone of any tech project is its developers. Our Developer Matchmaking service is curated to connect you with a developer who‚Äôs not just skilled but the right fit for your project‚Äôs unique needs. We ensure they are well-versed in building MVPs, understand startup dynamics, and are agile in their approach.

points.title: Tech Stack Optimization: Tailored for MVP Success
points.description: Our approach is simple yet effective - we optimize the tech stack to suit your MVP. This means faster development, cost efficiency, and a product that‚Äôs ready to scale. Whether it's leveraging the power of cloud computing or choosing the right database, we tailor it to your project's specific requirements.

points.title: In-Depth Consulting: From Ideation to Launch
points.description: Every stage of your project is crucial. Our consulting covers market analysis, feature prioritization, tech road mapping, and more. We‚Äôre there from the ideation phase to the launch, ensuring each step is executed with precision.

points.title: Ongoing Support and Progress Tracking
points.description: Our commitment doesn‚Äôt end when your project launches. We offer ongoing support, ensuring your product evolves with the market and your business needs. Regular progress tracking and agile adaptations keep your project on the path to success.

howItWorks.title: A Process that Will <0>Guarantee your Success</0>
howItWorks.description: 4 easy steps to start your journey to Successfulness.

steps.title: Idea Refining
steps.description: We start by evaluating, refining and bring you advices on your idea for market readiness and success.

steps.title: Developer Matchmaking
steps.description: We then match you with a developer from our pool, tailored to your project's needs and your working style.

steps.title: Development Process
steps.description: With the team ready, we begin development, with regular updates to align team's work with your vision.

steps.title: Launch and Support
steps.description: Once your MVP is ready, we assist with the launch and provide ongoing post-launch support.

testimonials.title: <0>They'll Talk</0> about Us <0>Better than We Do</0>
testimonials.description: Don‚Äôt just take our word for it. Hear from our clients who have transformed their ideas into success with our help. Their stories are a testament to our commitment and expertise.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We understand you have questions, and we‚Äôve got all the answers. From the specifics of our services to how we handle different project scales, our FAQ section is designed to clarify all your doubts.

questions.question: What sets Fabrik apart in delivering my project?
questions.answer: At Fabrik, you're not just hiring a developer; you're gaining a tech visionary and a strategic ally. We take your concept and elevate it with a blend of precision, innovation, and market savvy. Our clients, like Julia from April Marine, have lauded our adaptable approach and communicative clarity, essential in bringing your idea to market triumphantly!

questions.question: How involved can I be in the development process?
questions.answer: Collaboration is the heartbeat of creation here at Fabrik. You'll be in the driver's seat with regular check-ins, updates, and iterations. We believe your input is invaluable, and your involvement will be as flexible as you'll need it to be.

questions.question: Can you handle the unique needs of my project?
questions.answer: Every project is a new adventure, and adaptability is our creed. From AI to blockchain, I've personally ensured that Fabrik's solutions are as unique as the challenges they meet ‚Äì a testament to our diverse client portfolio, including names like Lagerfeld and Groupama.

questions.question: What if I need to pivot or adjust my project's direction?
questions.answer: Flexibility is key. If your vision evolves, so do our strategies. We're here to navigate the shifts and turns of the digital landscape with you, ensuring a product that's not just complete, but dynamic and responsive to the market's pulse.

questions.question: How does Fabrik ensure quality in a tight timeframe?
questions.answer: Quality is non-negotiable. With a robust framework and a seasoned team led by a CTO who has conquered hackathons worldwide, we deliver excellence swiftly without cutting corners. Our client Jean-Francois from JEAN FRANCOIS THORON can attest to the professional standards we uphold, no matter the deadline pressure.

questions.question: What about after the launch?
questions.answer: Launching is just the beginning. We'll stand by you when your digital solution takes flight, offering support, guidance, and enhancement services to ensure your product not only thrives but also grows with your ambition.

questions.question: What exactly can I expect from your CTO consulting service?
questions.answer: Imagine having a seasoned tech strategist, a 15-year veteran in web and mobile development, by your side. That's what you get with Fabrik's CTO consulting. I'll be your guide, turning complex tech into a competitive edge, ensuring your project is not just built, but crafted for success.

questions.question: There are many development services out there. Why should I choose Fabrik?
questions.answer: Unlike others, Fabrik provides you with a blend of strategic oversight and technical execution. Our clients, from solo visionaries to industry giants, all share stories of transformation and growth, thanks to our bespoke solutions that resonate with their target audience.

questions.question: I've had mixed experiences with developers in the past. How will this be different with you?
questions.answer: We're not just developers; we're creators and innovators. We thrive on challenges and deliver solutions that don't just meet expectations but exceed them. Our commitment is proven through a portfolio of varied, successful projects and the testimonials of our delighted clients.

questions.question: How flexible is Fabrik with project changes and pivots?
questions.answer: Agility is at the core of our operations. We pivot as quickly as the digital landscape changes, ensuring your project remains at the cutting edge. Your vision is our blueprint, and we adapt our strategies to align with your evolving business goals.

questions.question: What if I'm new to tech world and feel overwhelmed?
questions.answer: Don't worry, you're in safe hands. We demystify technology and walk you through every step, turning complexity into clarity. Our clients appreciate our approachable guidance, making tech an empowering tool rather than a daunting challenge.

questions.question: How do you guarantee project success?
questions.answer: Success for us is seeing you surpass your goals. We align our processes with your vision, setting clear milestones and delivering measurable results. If we don't meet our own highest standards, we'll work doubly hard to ensure your success, without extra cost.

meetCto.title: Meet our <0>CTO</0> - Jeremy
meetCto.description: Jeremy, the CTO of Fabrik, is a strategic tech advisor with a 15-year track record in full-stack development. He's an award-winning participant in global hackathons, specializing in AI, blockchain, and building cutting-edge web & mobile applications. He also leads open-source AI projects and provides end-to-end project management and consultancy.

quote.title: Let's explore your technical needs together.
quote.text: Schedule a 30-minute consultation with me, Jeremy, your CTO at Fabrik. It's completely free, and there's no pressure. If we find that there's a fit, great! If not, that's totally okay too. I'm here to help you clarify your needs and see how we can bring value to your vision.
quote.name: Jeremy Andr√©

finish.title: Our Commitment is Your Success
finish.description: We are not just a service provider; we are your partner in success. Our commitment is to see your idea not just take off but soar in the market. With us, you‚Äôre not just building a product; you‚Äôre building a future.

footer.description: Embrace the future of MVP development with us ‚Äì where your vision meets our expertise.
